name: Food Eater (iEpicGreen)
description:
Food Eater. 

Your goal is to collect all of the food without hitting any of the rotten food (enemies). Each time you collect a piece of food your character will start automatically moving in a different direction. You must counter this by moving the other way.

Enjoy the game!

NOTE: This game is still in beta and I only started development recently. Please comment if you find any bugs and I will do my best to fix them with the next update.
